name: Santa'snaughtyornicelist
0:
”Alexa ask Santas list”
”Are they on the nice list”
”Are they on the naughty list”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santas list
des:
Give your child the magic of Christmas and also use the power of Santa to keep your child being good in the run up to Christmas.

ADULTS ONLY READ BELOW:

Ask "Are they on the nice list" and Alexa will reply that they are on the nice list.

ASK "Are they on the naughty list" and Alexa will reply that they are on the naughty list.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
